oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DETERMINATION OF THE STOICHIOMETRY OF VANADIUM NITRIDE FILMS BY PROTON BACKSCATTERING
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAMANA, JV
RAJU, VS
RAY, AK
GANGADHARAN, S
SRINIVASA, RS
CHANDORKAR, AN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: backscattering
tin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Vanadium nitride films were grown on stainless steel and silicon, with different nitrogen concentrations by varying the partial pressures of nitrogen in a DC magnetron sputtering set-up. These films were characterized for their composition by proton back-scattering and their micro hardness values were correlated with their N/V ratio.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF RADIOANALYTICAL AND NUCLEAR CHEMISTRY-ARTICLES, 174(2), 265-270
